sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Form, Table, Card, Row, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; class BondPricingTwo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bonds: [], label: 'Attach .csv', totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0, totalDate: null, month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), hideTable: true, showCards: { visibility: 'hidden' }, exportResults: [] }; this.setFilename = this.setFilename.bind(this) this.formatDate = this.formatDate.bind(this) this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) this.onUpdateClick = this.onUpdateClick.bind(this) } formatDate(value_date) { const months = { "1": "Jan.", "2": "Feb.", "3": "March", "4": "April", "5": "May", "6": "June", "7": "July", "8": "Aug.", "9": "Sept", "10": "Oct", "11": "Nov", "12": "Dec" } let month = value_date.split('/')[0] let year = value_date.split('/')[1] let month_string = months[month] + ' 1, ' + year return month_string } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } handleClickX(element) { element.parentNode.parentNode.remove() if ((document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByClassName('bond-row')).length > 0) { this.onUpdateClick(); } else { this.setState({ totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0 }) } } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onUpdateClick() { let rows = document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tr') let bonds = [] let vMonth = document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value let vYear = document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value for (let i = 1; i < rows.length; i++) { let series = rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[1].innerHTML let denomination = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[2].innerHTML).substring(1) let serialNumber = rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[0].innerHTML let iMonth = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[3].innerHTML).split('/')[0] let iYear = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[3].innerHTML).split('/')[1] let bond = { 'vMonth': vMonth, 'vYear': vYear, 'series': series, 'denomination': denomination, 'serialNumber': serialNumber, 'iMonth': iMonth, 'iYear': iYear, } bonds.push(bond) } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/update', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { let bondRows = document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tbody')[0] bondRows.remove() let exports = [["Value as of", "Serial #", "Series", "Denomination", "Issue Date", "Next Accrual", "Final Maturity", "Issue Price", "Interest", "Value"]] for (let i = 0; i < response[0].length; i++) { this.appendToTable(response[0][i]) exports.push([ response[0][i]['vDate'], response[0][i]['serialNumber'], response[0][i]['series'], '$' + response[0][i]['denomination'], response[0][i]['iDate'], '$' + response[0][i]['iPrice'], response[0][i]['aDate'], response[0][i]['mDate'], '$' + response[0][i]['value'], '$' + response[0][i]['interest'] ]) } exports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + response[1]['totalDenominations'], "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalPrices']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalInterests']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalValues']).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) this.setState({ exportResults: exports }) }) } setFilename(e) { if (e.target.files.length > 0) { this.setState({ label: e.target.files[0].name }) } if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false, showCards: { visibility: 'visible' } }) } let vMonth = document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value let vYear = document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const bonds = reader.result const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds, vMonth, vYear }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/upload', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { let exports = [] exports.push(['Lookup Date', 'Serial Number', 'Series', 'Bond Amount', 'Issue Date', 'Next Accrual', 'Final Maturity', 'Issue Price', 'Interest', 'Interest Rate', 'Bond Value']) for (let i = 0; i < response[0].length; i++) { let values = [ response['vDate'], response['serialNumber'], response['series'], '$' + response['denomination'], response['iDate'], response['aDate'], response['mDate'], '$' + response['iPrice'], '$' + response['interest'], '$' + response['value'] ] exports.push(values); } this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) exports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + response[1]['totalDenominations'], "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalPrices']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalInterests']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalValues']).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ bonds: response[0], exportResults: exports }) }) } reader.readAsText(e.target.files[0]); } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> ATTACHMENT
{this.state.exportResults.length > 0 ?
0 ? this.state.exportResults : ''}>+ [Export]
: null} VALUED AS OF {this.state.totalDate} TOTAL FACE VALUE ${this.state.totalDenomination} TOTAL COST ${parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2)} TOTAL INTEREST ${parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2)} TOTAL VALUE ${parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2)}
{ this.state.bonds.length > 0 ? {this.state.bonds.map((bond, i) => ( ))}
Serial Number Bond Type Bond Amount Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Value
{bond['serialNumber']} {bond['series']} ${bond['denomination']} {bond['iDate']} {bond['aDate']} {bond['mDate']} ${parseFloat(bond['iPrice']).toFixed(2)} ${parseFloat(bond['interest']).toFixed(2)} ${parseFloat(bond['value']).toFixed(2)}
: null}
) } } export default BondPricingTwo;
